利申:乞食科，諗起搵工同兩老就頭痛

Tier1: Medic>dental>qfin/gbus
Tier2: 五寶 >law >education
Tier3: IT/Nursing> Bba(acc>fin)

Tier5: Art/sosci/sci

quote.msg:
根據之前嘅討論
Tier1: Medic>dental>qfin/gbus
Tier2: 五寶 >law >education
Tier3: IT/Nursing> Bba(acc>fin)

Tier5: Art/sosci/sci

replies.msg:
同上
睇埋起薪點, 工作環境, 同埋升職機會最實際

唔使講:
medic/dental>三寶>=五寶>nursing (全部醫療科sosad)

generally咁睇, 未必同個科有關(事實上, 神科嘅人通常比較醒目):
gbus/qfin: 好多入ibank, 前途唔使講
CS ~starting 2xk, 要keep住進修, 3年30k
Engine ~20k, depends on discipline, 同it差唔多
Edu: 要爭教職, more and more contract post
bba(acct): 叫做好過其他bba, big4奴隸3年30k, 但係要知道其他major都可以報big4
bba: 通常你會發現business d工 welcome all discipline, 講左咩自己參透下
social work: 少數做到報警撚就正
ba: 英文major叫做好啲, 其他...
sci: 真係為興趣, 覺得中學太淺, 5** 先至好讀 (啲嘢難到有興趣都變冇興趣)

Law??? 睇家底

quote.msg:
根據之前嘅討論
Tier1: Medic>dental>qfin/gbus
Tier2: 五寶 >law >education
Tier3: IT/Nursing> Bba(acc>fin)
Tier4: engine, archi, social work> BBA(mgt/mkt)
Tier5: Art/sosci/sci

replies.msg: 今年仲揀係香港讀大學 真係有前途

識揀一定揀理大電機工程
dse 19分起薪23k 做幾年考埋牌就50k
讀書又簡單 都係sub下數計下v=ir gpa輕鬆爆4
理大注重practical，暑假去ic工業中心實戰，唔識都操到你識，外面嘅公司鍾意請理大多過港大，因為已經識曬點樣做嘢

讀其他科例如civil好睇經濟週期 經濟唔好就成班人冇工開
讀電機工程叻嘅入中電港燈 唔叻嘅入港鐵 長做長有
dse 19，20分識揀一定揀理大電機工程

quote.msg: What about nutrition
There’s no accredited bachelor degree of nutrition in HK
如果係英國讀呢 一樣？

replies.msg:
一樣，只有degree 冇用，攞到外國註冊營養師資格先有用

公私營醫院、政府機構（如衛生署）、NGO 普遍承認英國 (英國衛生及護理專業委員會)、美國 (美國營養註冊委員會)、澳洲 (澳洲營養師協會) 或加拿大 (加拿大省級營養師註冊機構) 的註冊營養師資格。

香港大學專業進修學院與英國 Ulster University 合辦的『營養治療學深造文憑 / 碩士』課程是唯一的本地途徑，只要再通過本地醫院實習及考試後，便可申請成為英國註冊營養師。惟她指，上述課程每兩三年才開辦一屆，且學額僧多粥少，故不少經濟能力許可者，會選擇到英、美、澳、加升學及取得有關專業資格。她估計，每年有約 10 多名從海外取得註冊營養師資格者回流香港執業。

replies.msg: 五年後可能可以升1,2級

quote.msg:
根據之前嘅討論
Tier1: Medic>dental>qfin/gbus
Tier2: 五寶 >law >education
Tier3: IT/Nursing> Bba(acc>fin)
Tier4: engine, archi, social work> BBA(mgt/mkt)
Tier5: Art/sosci/sci

同上
睇埋起薪點, 工作環境, 同埋升職機會最實際

唔使講:
medic/dental>三寶>=五寶>nursing (全部醫療科sosad)

generally咁睇, 未必同個科有關(事實上, 神科嘅人通常比較醒目):
gbus/qfin: 好多入ibank, 前途唔使講
CS ~starting 2xk, 要keep住進修, 3年30k
Engine ~20k, depends on discipline, 同it差唔多
Edu: 要爭教職, more and more contract post
bba(acct): 叫做好過其他bba, big4奴隸3年30k, 但係要知道其他major都可以報big4
bba: 通常你會發現business d工 welcome all discipline, 講左咩自己參透下
social work: 少數做到報警撚就正
ba: 英文major叫做好啲, 其他...
sci: 真係為興趣, 覺得中學太淺, 5** 先至好讀 (啲嘢難到有興趣都變冇興趣)

Law??? 睇家底

replies.msg: 讀英文可以做咩工

quote.msg:
識揀一定揀理大電機工程
dse 19分起薪23k 做幾年考埋牌就50k
讀書又簡單 都係sub下數計下v=ir gpa輕鬆爆4
理大注重practical，暑假去ic工業中心實戰，唔識都操到你識，外面嘅公司鍾意請理大多過港大，因為已經識曬點樣做嘢

讀其他科例如civil好睇經濟週期 經濟唔好就成班人冇工開
讀電機工程叻嘅入中電港燈 唔叻嘅入港鐵 長做長有
dse 19，20分識揀一定揀理大電機工程

I beg to differ.

Holding a MBBS(HKU) or MBChB(CUHK) would render you registrable in Singapore without exams.

Holding middle qualifications or above would render you eligible to apply specialist entry to UK,Aus, NZ and Canada without furthet exams.

Having obtained full registration and worked for 1yr in UK would exempt you from Australian & NZ medical licensing exam

replies.msg:
Ya, u r right

I mean, actually anyone with or without background in nutritional science could legally claim himself a nutritionist. No accredition is ever needed for a degree in nutritions apart from those generally and universally required for ug/postgrad/phd degree.

Hence, it would be weird to say "There isnt any accredited degree in nutrition" when no accredition is indeed required

replies.msg:
Problems may arise if the local specialty qualifying exams are neither directly nor conjointly held by a reputable foreign college, however, it is actually on a case-by-case basis, depending whether the solely local qualification are included in the lists of recongnizable specialist qualifications in the target country.

So my pt is drs in hk could techically immigrate easily to english-speaking developed countries if wanted, however most do not pursue so for monetary, family ,etc issues

quote.msg:
U r wrong, to be exact and accurate, there are accredited master degrees in HK that lead to registrable dietitian qualifications.

U dont even recognize the difference btw nutritionists and dietitians

But the list here are obviously for ug programs
Nutritionist sucks, they are not professionally protected
While dietitian can work in a hospital to provide clinical services

Ya, u r right

I mean, actually anyone with or without background in nutritional science could legally claim himself a nutritionist. No accredition is ever needed for a degree in nutritions apart from those generally and universally required for ug/postgrad/phd degree.

Hence, it would be weird to say "There isnt any accredited degree in nutrition" when no accredition is indeed required

replies.msg: Bro that’s so true

quote.msg:
I beg to differ.

Holding a MBBS(HKU) or MBChB(CUHK) would render you registrable in Singapore without exams.

Holding middle qualifications or above would render you eligible to apply specialist entry to UK,Aus, NZ and Canada without furthet exams.

Having obtained full registration and worked for 1yr in UK would exempt you from Australian & NZ medical licensing exam

Singapore就算啦 留香港做醫生仲好
英澳紐加就真 所以唔會係一般移民pathway
移民顧問都應該唔清楚mrcp frcp嗰啲

replies.msg: No, immirgration agents r familiar with these qualifications and visa quotas Every yr , dozens of southeast asia & middle east trained drs move to uk & aus, and relatively fewer to US&Cana

quote.msg:
識揀一定揀理大電機工程
dse 19分起薪23k 做幾年考埋牌就50k
讀書又簡單 都係sub下數計下v=ir gpa輕鬆爆4
理大注重practical，暑假去ic工業中心實戰，唔識都操到你識，外面嘅公司鍾意請理大多過港大，因為已經識曬點樣做嘢

讀其他科例如civil好睇經濟週期 經濟唔好就成班人冇工開
讀電機工程叻嘅入中電港燈 唔叻嘅入港鐵 長做長有

quote.msg:
根據之前嘅討論
Tier1: Medic>dental>qfin/gbus
Tier2: 五寶 >law >education
Tier3: IT/Nursing> Bba(acc>fin)
Tier4: engine, archi, social work> BBA(mgt/mkt)
Tier5: Art/sosci/sci

同上
睇埋起薪點, 工作環境, 同埋升職機會最實際

唔使講:
medic/dental>三寶>=五寶>nursing (全部醫療科sosad)

generally咁睇, 未必同個科有關(事實上, 神科嘅人通常比較醒目):
gbus/qfin: 好多入ibank, 前途唔使講
CS ~starting 2xk, 要keep住進修, 3年30k
Engine ~20k, depends on discipline, 同it差唔多
Edu: 要爭教職, more and more contract post
bba(acct): 叫做好過其他bba, big4奴隸3年30k, 但係要知道其他major都可以報big4
bba: 通常你會發現business d工 welcome all discipline, 講左咩自己參透下
social work: 少數做到報警撚就正
ba: 英文major叫做好啲, 其他...
sci: 真係為興趣, 覺得中學太淺, 5** 先至好讀 (啲嘢難到有興趣都變冇興趣)

Law??? 睇家底

cityu law>cuhk law

replies.msg:
前Ifirm HR:
見到CU嘅 9成9飛左你份CV
因為grade /hon同工作能力長期不符
總之俾我哋嘅感覺就係佢成日亂派grade
另外1% 就睇你識唔識人同埋屋企背景


順便勸世
除非你屋企識法律界嘅人/有錢 又或者你自信到可以Kong U gpa3.3以上

否則強烈建議唔好揀law讀

做律師都係想搵錢
ifirm trainee 都5萬幾一個月
但係入得嘅全部都係天之驕子 一係富二代由細到大讀嘅係英國間哈羅 oxbridge 一係真係有實力嘅KongU 1st hon 普通人點同佢地比？


但當你係普通人 普通U LLB grad 但好有熱誠想做大律師 伸張正義
首先你要讀個濕鳩PCLL 再拎住個畢業證書不斷搵工搵到懷疑人生 等咗好耐終於有間中型嘅local firm肯收你
16k人工有返工冇收工 之後又要揾個師父跟 而你師父嘅名氣亦代表你日後嘅叫價 跟到清洪嗰啲未魚躍龍門 但係好嘅師父大把人爭住in 就算俾你最後做到大狀 又有冇人肯比啲case你？到最後呢個時候又要睇你個人同埋屋企嘅connection
而大多數嘅fg bb都會比呢個現實打沉 最後發現做個Solicitor 得閒搞下離婚地契 仲多錢過冇名氣嘅大侓師
總之唔好簡中醫
